snippet: Mr. Rubio will detail his energy plan on Friday in the home state of his fellow candidate Gov. John R. Kasich, and boasted in a news release that he had more money in the bank than Jeb Bush.
abstract: Mr. Rubio will detail his energy plan on Friday in the home state of his fellow candidate Gov. John R. Kasich, and boasted in a news release that he had more money in the bank than Jeb Bush.

headline.main: Marco Rubio to Talk Energy Policy in Ohio, With Some Jabs at His Opponents
